    • configureUsersModule

    Function configureUsersModule

    • configureUsersModule(
          __namedParameters: ModuleInput<UserSettingsOptions>,
      ): Promise<
          {
              addPushSubscription: (
                  userId: string,
                  subscription: any,
                  subscriptionOptions?: {
                      unsubscribeFromOtherUsers: boolean;
                      userAgent: string;
                  },
              ) => Promise<void>;
              addRoles: (userId: string, roles: string[]) => Promise<number>;
              deletePermanently: (
                  __namedParameters: { userId: string },
              ) => Promise<User>;
              markDeleted: (userId: string) => Promise<User>;
              removePushSubscription: (userId: string, p256dh: string) => Promise<void>;
              updateAvatar: (_id: string, fileId: string) => Promise<User>;
              updateGuest: (user: User, guest: boolean) => Promise<void>;
              updateHeartbeat: (
                  userId: string,
                  lastLogin: UserLastLogin,
              ) => Promise<User>;
              updateLastBillingAddress: (
                  _id: string,
                  lastBillingAddress: Address,
              ) => Promise<User>;
              updateLastContact: (_id: string, lastContact: Contact) => Promise<User>;
              updateProfile: (
                  userId: string,
                  updatedData: { meta?: any; profile?: UserProfile },
              ) => Promise<User>;
              updateRoles: (_id: string, roles: string[]) => Promise<User>;
              updateTags: (_id: string, tags: string[]) => Promise<User>;
              updateUser: (
                  selector: mongodb.Filter<User>,
                  modifier: UpdateFilter<User>,
                  updateOptions?: FindOneAndUpdateOptions,
              ) => Promise<User>;
              webAuthn: {
                  createCredentialCreationOptions: (
                      origin: string,
                      username: string,
                      extensionOptions?: any,
                  ) => Promise<SerializedOptions<PublicKeyCredentialCreationOptions>>;
                  createCredentialRequestOptions: (
                      origin: string,
                      username?: string,
                      extensionOptions?: any,
                  ) => Promise<SerializedOptions<PublicKeyCredentialRequestOptions>>;
                  deleteUserWebAuthnCredentials: (username: string) => Promise<number>;
                  findMDSMetadataForAAGUID: (aaguid: string) => Promise<any>;
                  verifyCredentialCreation: (
                      username: string,
                      credentials: any,
                  ) => Promise<
                      {
                          aaguid: string;
                          counter: any;
                          created: Date;
                          id: any;
                          publicKey: any;
                      },
                  >;
                  verifyCredentialRequest: (
                      userPublicKeys: any[],
                      username: string,
                      credentials: any,
                  ) => Promise<{ userHandle: any }>;
              };
              addEmail(userId: string, address: string): Promise<void>;
              count(query: UserQuery): Promise<number>;
              createUser(
                  rawUserData: UserRegistrationData,
                  __namedParameters?: {
                      skipMessaging?: boolean;
                      skipPasswordEnrollment?: boolean;
                  },
              ): Promise<string>;
              findResetToken(
                  plainToken: string,
              ): Promise<{ address: string; userId: string; when: Date }>;
              findUnverifiedEmailToken(
                  plainToken: string,
              ): Promise<{ address: string; userId: string; when: Date }>;
              findUser(
                  query: {
                      _id?: Condition<string>;
                      avatarId?: Condition<string>;
                      created?: Condition;
                      deleted?: Condition;
                      emails?: Condition<Email[]>;
                      guest?: Condition<boolean>;
                      initialPassword?: Condition<boolean>;
                      lastBillingAddress?: Condition;
                      lastContact?: Condition;
                      lastLogin?: Condition;
                      meta?: any;
                      profile?: Condition;
                      pushSubscriptions?: Condition<PushSubscriptionObject[]>;
                      roles?: Condition<string[]>;
                      services?: any;
                      tags?: Condition<string[]>;
                      updated?: Condition;
                      username?: Condition<string>;
                  } & RootFilterOperators<WithId<User>> & {
                      emailVerified?: boolean;
                      includeDeleted?: boolean;
                      includeGuests?: boolean;
                      lastLogin?: DateFilterInput;
                      queryString?: string;
                  } & { sort?: SortOption[] },
                  findOptions?: FindOptions,
              ): Promise<User>;
              findUserByEmail(email: string): Promise<User>;
              findUserById(userId: string): Promise<User>;
              findUserByToken(plainToken: string): Promise<User>;
              findUserByUsername(username: string): Promise<User>;
              findUsers(
                  __namedParameters: {
                      _id?: Condition<string>;
                      avatarId?: Condition<string>;
                      created?: Condition;
                      deleted?: Condition;
                      emails?: Condition<Email[]>;
                      guest?: Condition<boolean>;
                      initialPassword?: Condition<boolean>;
                      lastBillingAddress?: Condition;
                      lastContact?: Condition;
                      lastLogin?: Condition;
                      meta?: any;
                      profile?: Condition;
                      pushSubscriptions?: Condition<PushSubscriptionObject[]>;
                      roles?: Condition<string[]>;
                      services?: any;
                      tags?: Condition<string[]>;
                      updated?: Condition;
                      username?: Condition<string>;
                  } & RootFilterOperators<WithId<User>> & {
                      emailVerified?: boolean;
                      includeDeleted?: boolean;
                      includeGuests?: boolean;
                      lastLogin?: DateFilterInput;
                      queryString?: string;
                  } & { limit?: number; offset?: number; sort?: SortOption[] },
              ): Promise<User[]>;
              hashPassword(password: string): Promise<{ pbkdf2: string }>;
              primaryEmail(user: User): Email;
              removeEmail(userId: string, address: string): Promise<void>;
              resetPassword(token: string, newPassword: string): Promise<User>;
              sendResetPasswordEmail(
                  userId: string,
                  email: string,
                  isEnrollment?: boolean,
              ): Promise<void>;
              sendVerificationEmail(userId: string, email: string): Promise<void>;
              setPassword(userId: string, plainPassword: string): Promise<User>;
              setUsername(userId: string, username: string): Promise<void>;
              userExists(__namedParameters: { userId: string }): Promise<boolean>;
              userLocale(user: User): Locale;
              verifyEmail(userId: string, address: string): Promise<void>;
              verifyPassword(
                  __namedParameters: { bcrypt?: string; pbkdf2?: string },
                  plainPassword: string,
              ): Promise<boolean>;
          },
